attributes.action: Clear Tuition Fee Debt & Refund Self-funded Students for this academic semester
attributes.additional_details: This academic year has been continuously disrupted for students, from a lack of resolution for the UCU strikes to the more recent rapid transition to online learning and drastic changes to students financial situations due to COVID-19. Whilst efforts are being made by universities to support students through a variety of methods, the financial burden of tuition fees and being able to make ends meet still exists and cannot be supported through hardship funds alone.
attributes.background: Work with Student Loans Company, and Student Finance England to clear tuition fee debt for this academic semester. And to provide funding to Universities to refund self-funding students.

rejection.details:
